channel.title: Alright im in the middle of my first script[checkup]

item.title: Alright im in the middle of my first script[checkup]
item.dc:creator: @derek9456 derek9456
item.description:
@derek9456 wrote:

[scar]program oakcutterandbanker;

{.include deadmouse.scar}
{.include squig.txt}
{.include srl/srl.scar}

Const
BankSymbol = ; //the color of the banksymbol on the minimap.
TreeColor1 = 2252880; //the color of the tree
TreeColor2 = 3303512; //the other color of the tree
TreeColor3 = 1931368; //the other color of the tree
wearaxe = true; //do you want to wear your axe?
Var
x,y,O,treescut : integer;

procedure CutThatTree;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,TreeColor1,5,5,514,337,2)) or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,TreeColor2,5,5,514,337,2)) or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,TreeColor3,5,5,514,337,2)) then
deadmouse(x,y,40,30,30);
movemousesmooth(x,y) //moves the mouse towards the color
wait(1000+random(500)) //wait a random time
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(O,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then //this is the bitmap
begin
getmousepos(x,y) //gets the position of the mouse
clickmouse(x,y,true) // clicks the mouse at its current position
wait(3000+random(1000)) //waits 3 seconds + 1 second
end;
treescut:=treescut+1;
end;

Procedure bank; //banks all of the wood
begin
repeat
openbank;
wait(1000);
until (bankscreen);
if (wearaxe=true) then
depositall
else
if (wearaxe=false)
thendeposit(2,28,2);
end;

Procedure Flag; //a procedure that waits until the flag is not on the minimap.
var flagimage:integer;
begin
flagimage := BitmapFromString(2, 2,‘FF00005D3311C656045D3311’);
repeat
wait(250);
until(not findbitmapin( flagimage, x, y, 570, 5, 725, 162));
freebitmap(flagimage);
end;

procedure walkbank;
begin
If(FindColorspiral(x,y,BankSymbol,573,8,723,158))then //573,8,723,158 are the Edges of the Minimap.
begin
writeln(‘Found BankSymbol… Moving To The Bank!’);
deadmouse(x,y,40,30,30);
wait(500+random(500))
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Flag;
writeln(‘Made It To The Bank!’);
end
Else
writeln(‘Couldnt Find BankSymbol… Not Moving To The Bank!’);
end;

procedure loadbitmaps; //loads the bitmap
begin
O := BitmapFromString(9, 10, ‘z78DA333000014363177367172869’ +
‘6A6862606960E26CE96C0E253100A67AA82E08C0A117A21E228EA’ +
‘21E437624E8C21556C8616B801F20E9254A3D8900007EBA6E9B’);
end;

begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
cutthattree;
until(invfull)
end.[/scar]

k thats my script ill try taking out squig when i get back from my dads…

ill be on here while im there occasionally

i need help with my chopping procedure though. when it looks for the color it will find it and then it will check for the bitmap or the O in Oak (because im having it cut oaks for now but i am gunna change it so you can choose what kind of tree) but if it doesnt find it it looks for the color again but finds the same tree over and over again :(. how do i make it try a DIFFERENT tree?

i also need a procedure that just checks/solves all the randoms… probably arl randoms… thanks tons

Read full topic

item.title: Alright im in the middle of my first script[checkup]
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Well here are some random suggestions:

  1. Instead of making that flag procedure, just use SRL’s flag.
  2. To bank, use SRL’s. The procedure is just OpenBank; or if you’re using a pin, OpenBank2(pinhere); oh and use it like
    [scar]Procedure bank;
    begin
    repeat
    openbank;
    wait(1000);
    until (bankscreen);
    depositall; //only if you’re axe is equipted
    end;[/scar]
    If your axe isn’t equipted, then use instead of depositall; [scar]deposit(2,28,2);[/scar]

So if you want to set if you want to wear it or not then use this:[scar]
Procedure bank;
begin
repeat
openbank;
wait(1000);
until (bankscreen);
if (wearaxe=true) then
depositall else
if (wearaxe=false) then
deposit(2,28,2);
end;[/scar]
and add this to your constants [scar]const wearaxe = true; //do you want to wear your axe?[/scar]

  1. At the end it says [scar]until (treescut=28)[/scar]
    There are 2 problems there. One, it isn’t acurate. Two, what if you’re using an axe? I’ll try to solve that.
    Edit: Ok I solved it here: [scar]begin
    repeat
    cutthattree;
    until(invfull)
    end.[/scar]

And here is the full code [scar]program cutterandbanker;

{.include deadmouse.scar}
{.include squig.txt}
{.include srl/srl.scar}

Const
BankSymbol = 0; //the color of the banksymbol on the minimap.
TreeColor = 0; //the color of the tree
wearaxe = true; //do you want to wear your axe?
Var
x,y,C,treescut : integer;

procedure CutThatTree;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,TreeColor,5,5,514,337,2))then
deadmouse(x,y,40,30,30);
movemousesmooth(x,y) //moves the mouse towards the color
wait(1000+random(500)) //wait a random time
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(C,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then //this is the bitmap
begin
getmousepos(x,y) //gets the position of the mouse
clickmouse(x,y,true) // clicks the mouse at its current position
wait(3000+random(1000)) //waits 3 seconds + 1 second
end;
treescut:=treescut+1;
end;

Procedure Flag; //a procedure that waits until the flag is not on the minimap.
var flagimage:integer;
begin
flagimage := BitmapFromString(2, 2,‘FF00005D3311C656045D3311’);
repeat
wait(250);
until(not findbitmapin( flagimage, x, y, 570, 5, 725, 162));
freebitmap(flagimage);
end;

Procedure bank;
begin
repeat
openbank;
until (bankscreen);
if (wearaxe=true) then
depositall else
if (wearaxe=false) then
deposit(2,28,2);
end;

procedure walkbank;
begin
If(FindColorspiral(x,y,BankSymbol,573,8,723,158))then //573,8,723,158 are the Edges of the Minimap.
begin
writeln(‘Found BankSymbol… Moving To The Bank!’);
deadmouse(x,y,40,30,30);
wait(500+random(500))
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Flag;
writeln(‘Made It To The Bank!’);
bank;
Else
writeln(‘Couldnt Find BankSymbol… Not Moving To The Bank!’);
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
C := BitmapFromString(1, 17, ‘z78DA3330A0070000D9831321’);
end;

begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
cutthattree;
until(invfull)
end.[/scar]

Hope you learned alittle there I’ll be happy to try to answer anymore questions too.

Read full topic

item.title: Alright im in the middle of my first script[checkup]
item.dc:creator: @derek9456 derek9456
item.description:
@derek9456 wrote:

so for my first script i have been making a woodcutter and banker…

i have been reading tutorials and guides to make it and i would like any suggestions on whati should do next or what includes i should use to do diferent things

alright here is my script so far
[scar]program cutterandbanker;

{.include deadmouse.scar}
{.include squig.txt}

Const
BankSymbol = 0; //the color of the banksymbol on the minimap.
TreeColor = 0; //the color of the tree
Var
x,y,C,treescut : integer;

procedure CutThatTree;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,TreeColor,5,5,514,337,2))then
deadmouse(x,y,40,30,30);
movemousesmooth(x,y) //moves the mouse towards the color
wait(1000+random(500)) //wait a random time
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(C,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then //this is the bitmap
begin
getmousepos(x,y) //gets the position of the mouse
clickmouse(x,y,true) // clicks the mouse at its current position
wait(3000+random(1000)) //waits 3 seconds + 1 second
end;
treescut:=treescut+1;
end;

Procedure Flag; //a procedure that waits until the flag is not on the minimap.
var flagimage:integer;
begin
flagimage := BitmapFromString(2, 2,‘FF00005D3311C656045D3311’);
repeat
wait(250);
until(not findbitmapin( flagimage, x, y, 570, 5, 725, 162));
freebitmap(flagimage);
end;

procedure walkbank;
begin
If(FindColorspiral(x,y,BankSymbol,573,8,723,158))then //573,8,723,158 are the Edges of the Minimap.
begin
writeln(‘Found BankSymbol… Moving To The Bank!’);
deadmouse(x,y,40,30,30);
wait(500+random(500))
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Flag;
writeln(‘Made It To The Bank!’);
end
Else
writeln(‘Couldnt Find BankSymbol… Not Moving To The Bank!’);
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
C := BitmapFromString(1, 17, ‘z78DA3330A0070000D9831321’);
end;

begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
cutthattree;
until(treescut=28)
end.[/scar]

GOALS

[ul][li]change the bitmap finding in chopthattree so that it doesnt look for chop but the tree you choose[/li]
[li]put randoms in(im going to need some help with this)[/li]
[li]making it so it banks[/li][/ul]
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 04, 2006, 03:00:53 AM[/size][hr]ughhh just tested it for first time and it find a regular tree over and over again… how do i make it so if it doesnt find the bitmap it will try a diferent location of that color and try again

Read full topic
